name: Peacemaker (itch) (steampunkprogrammer)
description:
A dark horror themed dungeon crawler.

You are somewhere you should not be, loud booming voices, dark slithering tendrils. It calls to you.

The feeling of cold metal in your hands. A curse or a blessing.

Careful what you use. You could be making deals without even knowing it.

TIPS:

All controls are mouse only. You can drag items into the world and things within it. On to your character portrait and put bullets in your revolver chamber by dragging them to the slots.
